thread.title: My husband myself and two friends stayed here from 4th - 8th March 2017, it was to celebrate my husbands 50th Birthday.
thread.title_full: My husband myself and two friends stayed here from 4th - 8th March 2017, it was to celebrate my husbands 50th Birthday. - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: sallyleake
title: My husband myself and two friends stayed here from 4th - 8th March 2017, it was to celebrate my husbands 50th Birthday.
text:
Upon arrival we were given a room upgrade. The staff were very welcoming and helpful and the hotel is very modern and very clean. The air-conditioning was very effective in the rooms. The shower was powerful and hot. Beds and pillows very comfortable. Vending machines available offering items from packed sandwiches to wines and beer to toothbrushes 24hrs per day. Everything was thought of. The hotel was close to many sights, all within walking distance. We ate one evening in the restaurant as we were too tired to go out and the food was excellent value for money.
Room Tip: We were on floor 4, it was lovely and quiet. Close to Restaurant. See more room tips
